feed.title: [BIP-draft] CHECKSEQUENCEVERIFY - An opcode for relative locktime

entry.title: [BIP-draft] CHECKSEQUENCEVERIFY - An opcode for relative locktime
entry.summary: Two important developments have been made in the realm of Bitcoin. Firstly, a PR (pull request) has been issued for BIP (Bitcoin Improvement Proposal). This can be found on Github and is labeled as pull request number 179. Secondly, a pull request has been put forward for the opcode CHECKSEQUENCEVERIFY in Bitcoin Core. This too can be found on Github and is labeled as pull request number 6564. Both these developments are expected to bring significant advancements to the Bitcoin ecosystem.
